ygData.subject: Re: Rathe Mountains
ygData.msgSnippet: ... The cyclopses and giant skeletons spawn in the same points as the giants.  The lizards and basilisks supposedly do too, though I m not too sure about that.
ygData.messageBody:
On Mon, 25 Oct 1999, Crysarra de'Danaan wrote:
>
> I am new to the list (like the last few days)...and unfortunately I
> think I missed this message that he is referring to saying thanks for
> the tip. would someone be so kind as to repeat it or even send it to
> me privately? I would be most interested as I love to fight in the
> Rathe mountains but I have yet to ever make that kind of money....what

The cyclopses and giant skeletons spawn in the same points as
the giants. The lizards and basilisks supposedly do too,
though I'm not too sure about that. If you kill these guys,
you make more giants spawn. The lizards and basilisks are
major green to me and run away, and the pathing bugs make them
impossible to chase. So I'd just charm a gaint and tow it
around, ordering it to kill these guys.

Oh yeah, one more thing. Because of the pathing bugs and slow
updates (mobs blink in and out even with 0% PL), it's very
easy to accidently attack something someone else has already
attacked. So try to be understanding when it happens.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
